knimeNode.name: Memory Use
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to record current memory use

intro.p: This node records the current memory use in the JVM. The output is sent both to a data table and to flow variables

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

ports.inPort: Optional Flow Variable Connection to time the start
ports.outPort: Flow variable port with memory use added
